title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta until al dente.
Cook bacon until crispy.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture.
Serve with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Boil pasta until al dente.
Cook bacon until crispy.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture.
Serve with black pepper.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Fry the pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine everything and season with pepper.

title: Tuo Zaafi from the Norht
summary: A classic northen dish made with corn and millet flour. It is eaten with soup of different variaties.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Fry the pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine everything and season with pepper.
